channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro HouseCall for Home Networks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro HouseCall for Home Networks

item.title: CVE-2021-28649|2024-08-03T21:47:33.045Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20housecall%20for%20home%20networks
item.description: An incorrect permission vulnerability in the product installer for Trend Micro HouseCall for Home Networks version 5.3.1179 and below could allow an attacker to escalate privileges by placing arbitrary code on a specified folder and have that code be executed by an Administrator who is running a scan. Please note that an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-25247|2024-08-03T19:56:11.059Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20housecall%20for%20home%20networks
item.description: A DLL hijacking vulnerability Trend Micro HouseCall for Home Networks version 5.3.1063 and below could allow an attacker to use a malicious DLL to escalate privileges and perform arbitrary code execution. An attacker must already have user privileges on the machine to exploit this vulnerability.
